name: Space Raiders
summary: Embark on an intergalactic journey in this adrenaline-pumping 2D space shooter! Pilot your sleek spacecraft through treacherous enemy armadas as you battle to save the galaxy from imminent destruction. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, blast your way through wave after wave of alien invaders. Dodge incoming fire, shoot enemies in this thrilling arcade-style adventure. Are you ready to become the hero the universe desperately needs?
